table.name: block_exacompedulevels
table.title: K

table.name: block_exacompschooltypes
table.title: Maryland

table.name: block_exacompsubjects
table.title: Maryland State Curriculum - Health Education

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Mental and Emotional Health - Students will demonstrate the ability to use mental and emotional health knowledge, skills, and strategies to enhance wellness.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Alcohol, Tobacco, and Other Drugs - Students will demonstrate the ability to use drug knowledge, decision making skills, and health enhancing strategies to address, the use, non-use, and abuse of medications, alcohol, tobacco, and other drugs.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Personal and Consumer Health - Students will demonstrate the ability to use consumer knowledge, skills, and strategies to develop sound personal health practices involving the use of health care products, services, and community resources.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Communication

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Emotions

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Components of well being

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Components of Personal Well-being

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Recognize methods of communication.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Recognize appropriate methods of communication.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Recognize different types of communication skills.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Examine emotions and responses to various situations.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Recognize that emotions come from basic needs.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Describe how emotions influence behaviors.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Establish how emotions influence behavior.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Identify components to promote personal well-being.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Identify the components to promote personal well-being.

table.name: block_exacomptopics
table.title: Summarize the components that promote personal well-being.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Demonstrate positive communication among peers.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Define ways to communicate with friends and family, such as eye-contact and tone of voice.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Identify methods of communication appropriate for specific situations.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Demonstrate appropriate methods of communication.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Practice verbal and non-verbal methods of communication.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Identify basic emotions/feelings.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Demonstrate expression of basic emotions/feelings.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Define different feelings.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Relate human needs to human emotions.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Demonstrate the ability to modify emotional responses.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Compare helpful and harmful emotional responses.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Synthesize positive ways to manage emotions.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Name two cooperation skills.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Predict what it feels like to work cooperatively with others in a group.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Identify and describe the emotional and physical human needs, such as shelter, food, water, and love.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Identify and describe human social needs

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Describe the social needs addressed by belonging to a group.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Recognize the feelings of being excluded from a group.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Describe components of personal well-being, identified as spiritual, physical, intellectual, emotional/mental, social, and environmental.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Relate components of personal well-being to personal life situations and why they are important.

table.name: block_exacompdescriptors
table.title: Explore ways community, family, and school contribute to liking self.
